verses.verse: In those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> there was no <S%H369><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> in Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and in those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of the Danites <S%H1839><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> them an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in; for to that day <S%H3117><s%> all their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> had not fallen <S%H5307><s%> to them among <S%H8432><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> of their family <S%H4940><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> men <S%H582><s%> <S%H1121><s%> from their coasts, <S%H7098><s%> men <S%H582><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> from Zorah, <S%H6881><s%> and from Eshtaol, <S%H847><s%> to spy <S%H7270><s%> out the land, <S%H776><s%> and to search <S%H2713><s%> it; and they said <S%H559><s%> to them, Go, <S%H3212><s%> search <S%H2713><s%> the land: <S%H776><s%> who when they came <S%H935><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah, <S%H4318><s%> they lodged <S%H3885><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

When they were by the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah, <S%H4318><s%> they knew <S%H5234><s%> the voice <S%H663><s%> of the young <S%H5288><s%> man the Levite: <S%H3881><s%> and they turned <S%H5493><s%> in thither, <S%H8033><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Who <S%H4310><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> you here? <S%H1988><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> you in this <S%H6311><s%> place? and what <S%H4100><s%> have you here? <S%H6311><s%>
And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, Thus <S%H2090><s%> and thus <S%H2088><s%> deals <S%H6213><s%> Micah <S%H4318><s%> with me, and has hired <S%H7936><s%> me, and I am his priest. <S%H3548><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> to him, Ask <S%H7592><s%> counsel, we pray <S%H4994><s%> you, of God, <S%H430><s%> that we may know <S%H3045><s%> whether our way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we go <S%H1980><s%> shall be prosperous. <S%H6743><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, Go <S%H3212><s%> in peace: <S%H7965><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is your way <S%H1870><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> you go. <S%H3212><s%>

Then the five <S%H2568><s%> men <S%H582><s%> departed, <S%H3212><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Laish, <S%H3919><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were therein, <S%H7130><s%> how they dwelled <S%H3427><s%> careless, <S%H983><s%> after the manner <S%H4941><s%> of the Zidonians, <S%H6722><s%> quiet <S%H8252><s%> and secure; <S%H982><s%> and there was no <S%H369><s%> magistrate <S%H3423><s%> <S%H6114><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> that might put <S%H3637><s%> them to shame <S%H3637><s%> in any thing; <S%H1697><s%> and they were far <S%H7350><s%> from the Zidonians, <S%H6722><s%> and had no <S%H369><s%> business <S%H1697><s%> with any man. <S%H120><s%>

And they came <S%H935><s%> to their brothers <S%H251><s%> to Zorah <S%H6881><s%> and Eshtaol: <S%H847><s%> and their brothers <S%H251><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, What <S%H4100><s%> say <S%H559><s%> you?

And they said, <S%H559><s%> Arise, <S%H6965><s%> that we may go <S%H5927><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> them: for we have seen <S%H7200><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is very <S%H3966><s%> good: <S%H2896><s%> and are you still? <S%H2814><s%> be not slothful <S%H6101><s%> to go, <S%H3212><s%> and to enter <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

When you go, <S%H935><s%> you shall come <S%H935><s%> to a people <S%H5971><s%> secure, <S%H982><s%> and to a large <S%H7342><s%> <S%H3027><s%> land: <S%H776><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> it into your hands; <S%H3027><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> want <S%H4270><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> that is in the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And there went <S%H5265><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Danites, <S%H1839><s%> out of Zorah <S%H6881><s%> and out of Eshtaol, <S%H847><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> appointed <S%H2296><s%> with weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war. <S%H4421><s%>

And they went <S%H5927><s%> up, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Kirjathjearim, <S%H7157><s%> in Judah: <S%H3063><s%> why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they called <S%H7121><s%> that place <S%H4725><s%> Mahanehdan <S%H4265><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is behind <S%H310><s%> Kirjathjearim. <S%H7157><s%>
And they passed <S%H5674><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah. <S%H4318><s%>

Then answered <S%H6030><s%> the five <S%H2568><s%> men <S%H582><s%> that went <S%H1980><s%> to spy <S%H7270><s%> out the country <S%H776><s%> of Laish, <S%H3919><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to their brothers, <S%H251><s%> Do you know <S%H3045><s%> that there is in these <S%H428><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%> an ephod, <S%H646><s%> and teraphim, <S%H8655><s%> and a graven <S%H6459><s%> image, and a molten <S%H4541><s%> image? now <S%H6258><s%> therefore consider <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> you have to do. <S%H6213><s%>

And they turned <S%H5493><s%> thitherward, <S%H8033><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the young <S%H5288><s%> man the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> even to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah, <S%H4318><s%> and saluted <S%H7592><s%> <S%H7965><s%> him.

And the six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> appointed <S%H2296><s%> with their weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> stood <S%H5324><s%> by the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gate. <S%H8179><s%>

And the five <S%H2568><s%> men <S%H582><s%> that went <S%H1980><s%> to spy <S%H7270><s%> out the land <S%H776><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up, and came <S%H935><s%> in thither, <S%H8033><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the graven <S%H6459><s%> image, and the ephod, <S%H646><s%> and the teraphim, <S%H8655><s%> and the molten <S%H4541><s%> image: and the priest <S%H3548><s%> stood <S%H5324><s%> in the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> with the six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that were appointed <S%H2296><s%> with weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war. <S%H4421><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into Micah's <S%H4318><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and fetched <S%H3947><s%> the carved <S%H6459><s%> image, the ephod, <S%H646><s%> and the teraphim, <S%H8655><s%> and the molten <S%H4541><s%> image. Then said <S%H559><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> to them, What <S%H4100><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> you?

And they said <S%H559><s%> to him, Hold <S%H2790><s%> your peace, <S%H2790><s%> lay <S%H7760><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> on your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and go <S%H3212><s%> with us, and be to us a father <S%H1><s%> and a priest: <S%H3548><s%> is it better <S%H2896><s%> for you to be a priest <S%H3548><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> or <S%H176><s%> that you be a priest <S%H3548><s%> to a tribe <S%H7626><s%> and a family <S%H4940><s%> in Israel? <S%H3478><s%>

And the priest's <S%H3548><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> was glad, <S%H3190><s%> and he took <S%H3947><s%> the ephod, <S%H646><s%> and the teraphim, <S%H8655><s%> and the graven <S%H6459><s%> image, and went <S%H935><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>
So they turned <S%H6437><s%> and departed, <S%H3212><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> the little <S%H2945><s%> ones and the cattle <S%H4735><s%> and the carriage <S%H3520><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

And when they were a good <S%H7368><s%> way from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah, <S%H4318><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> that were in the houses <S%H1004><s%> near <S%H5973><s%> to Micah's <S%H4318><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> were gathered <S%H2199><s%> together, and overtook <S%H1692><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan. <S%H1835><s%>

And they cried <S%H7121><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan. <S%H1835><s%> And they turned <S%H5437><s%> their faces, <S%H6440><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Micah, <S%H4318><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> ails you, that you come <S%H2199><s%> with such a company? <S%H2199><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> You have taken <S%H3947><s%> away my gods <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I made, <S%H6213><s%> and the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and you are gone <S%H3212><s%> away: and what <S%H4100><s%> have I more? <S%H5750><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> that you say <S%H559><s%> to me, What <S%H4100><s%> ails you?

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Let not your voice <S%H6963><s%> be heard <S%H8085><s%> among us, lest <S%H6435><s%> angry <S%H4751><s%> <S%H5315><s%> fellows <S%H582><s%> run <S%H6293><s%> on you, and you lose <S%H622><s%> your life, <S%H5315><s%> with the lives <S%H5315><s%> of your household. <S%H1004><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> their way: <S%H1870><s%> and when Micah <S%H4318><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that they were too strong <S%H2389><s%> for him, he turned <S%H6437><s%> and went <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> to his house. <S%H1004><s%>

And they took <S%H3947><s%> the things <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Micah <S%H4318><s%> had made, <S%H6213><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had, <S%H1961><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Laish, <S%H3919><s%> to a people <S%H5971><s%> that were at quiet <S%H8252><s%> and secure: <S%H982><s%> and they smote <S%H5221><s%> them with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and burnt <S%H8313><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

And there was no <S%H369><s%> deliverer, <S%H5337><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it was far <S%H7350><s%> from Zidon, <S%H6721><s%> and they had no <S%H369><s%> business <S%H1697><s%> with any man; <S%H120><s%> and it was in the valley <S%H6010><s%> that lies by Bethrehob. <S%H1050><s%> And they built <S%H1129><s%> a city, <S%H5892><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> therein.

And they called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> Dan, <S%H1835><s%> after the name <S%H8034><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> their father, <S%H1><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> to Israel: <S%H3478><s%> however, <S%H199><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> was Laish <S%H3919><s%> at the first. <S%H7223><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> set <S%H6965><s%> up the graven <S%H6459><s%> image: and Jonathan, <S%H3129><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom, <S%H1648><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> he and his sons <S%H1121><s%> were priests <S%H3548><s%> to the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> of the captivity <S%H1546><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

And they set <S%H7760><s%> them up Micah's <S%H4318><s%> graven <S%H6459><s%> image, which <S%H834><s%> he made, <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the time that the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was in Shiloh. <S%H7887><s%>
